title.rendered: How to Maximize Your ROI on Old Leads

content.rendered:
Learn How to Maximize Your ROI on Old Leads

Top-performing agents are separated from their lower-earning peers by their skill at converting old leads. The tools and techniques these agents use to follow up with old and new leads alike helps them earn six-figure incomes and ensure they don’t waste their lead generation budgets.

Stop wasting your marketing dollars! Learn how to maximize your ROI on old leads with this educational webinar recording. From mindset-altering facts about online leads to ROI-boosting lead conversion technologies, Sheldon will share practical knowledge you can use to build your business in 2017.

Watch this webinar recording to learn about:

  • How 10% of agents earn 90% of commissions
  • Converting leads using a service-oriented approach
  • 7-day lead follow-up plan of attack
  • Tools that maximize ROI on agents’ leads
  • And more!

Will You Need More Leads in 2017?

With Market Leader, you can get a guaranteed number of buyer and seller leads every month. These leads are exclusive — not shared with other agents. Lead inventory is limited, so check availability in your desired areas today!

Check Lead Availability
